name: Marian Brown
text: While waiting for my pizza, I witnessed one of the guys in the back repeatedly running his fingers through his hair. And, the one other guy that also makes the pizzas has eczema on his arms. He tosses the dough and it touches his arms. In …More

name: Dean Robert
text: From what I heard you guys need some good reviews. Out of pitty I grant you 5 stars. Despite what the other reviewers say I find the food great and the employees well mannered. The problem lies within the hypocritical owner.

name: john k
text: This location has changed management more times than an infant has its diaper changed in a day.  Again recently in 2016 the ownership/management has changed again.  So again, I decided to try them...was it better...somewhat, but nothing you …More

name: Bill DeGuardia
text: Papa John's closed for Good at that location it is now Dinozzos pizza

name: Gaby G
text: Pizza took one and a half hours to be delivered during non-peak hours, and when it arrived, it was ice cold. When I contacted the store, they proceeded to blame me. The gentleman told me I lived too far away, and that it was not their …More

name: Tandy Nguyen
text: This has happened 3 times, I do not know the process on updating their hours but I've ordered pizza from here an hour in a half before their stated 'closing time' and they always seem to close early? It makes no sense. Imo, this really reflects on their customer service skills/priorities.

name: robbussum
text: Went in for carryout at this location since I have not eaten Papa Johns in years. I waited 55 minutes after placing an order for a pan pizza with 5 toppings and a 20oz Pepsi. There were 4 other customers in the lobby who were waiting a long …More

name: Scott Zeigler
text: They are incredibly incompetent and could care less about improving.  always an excuse for no drivers, late pizza, or not answering the phone.  Horrible management and ownership!!

name: Mark ZIMMERMAN
text: This location has shut down and is being turned into a different pizzeria. It is no longer a papa johns

name: Emad Attalla
text: My pizza was ready fast....and very delicious

name: Andrew Dubost
text: i wouldnt recommend working there. i worked there for a bit and i strongly regret it

name: Amber Saltarelli
text: Ordered carryout, place was bustling, but was clean and orderly. Service was prompt and friendly. Pizza was ready and still hot and delicious when we got home.

name: Abhishek Upadhyay
text: This place makes Pizza better than Pizza hut and Domino's.

name: Beth Doran
text: Real close to my house and awsome pizza and bread sticks there. We Will go back again

name: Andrew Lewis
text: Their pizza delivery guy almost killed my family tonight. He flew through the stop sign at Yeager and Mingo. Didn't even slow down a bit. Right through the intersection at full speed.

name: Michelle Romano
text: Just recently tried their wings. Very tasty

name: Amanda Dean
text: Prices are too high and wait time was over when they told me it would be ready. Also a 2 litter soda is 2.99.... I didn't realize that the philly tax came to royersford...

name: Lisa Lauer
text: Worst experience ever. They act like your bothering them when you walk in to the establishment. Unfriendly and extremely unprofessional. They want to charge you an extra .50 for a 1ounce cup of cold sauce. There is no way you can eat 10inch …More

name: Ruth Dailey
text: Topping knee deep!  Well worth looking at the specials.

name: jose castillo
text: The manager was extremely rude. He refused to give me his name and also hung up on me 3 times. I wanted to speak to someone higher than him and he hung up. Never again will I order from here. I do not suggest this place for anyone!!!!

name: Jess Clifford
text: we order here frequently. Great food, awesome service!!!
